resources.string:
\ Androitis is a Tetris clone for Android, created by Michael Borgmann.
Tetris is a puzzle video game originally designed and programmed by Alexey Pajitnov in the Soviet Union, and was released on June 6, 1984.
For me, Androitis is just a test game to learn about the Android platform.
